snippet: The antivirus software founder, wanted for questioning about a neighbor’s killing in Belize, said he had chest pains, but a doctor said he was suffering from stress.
abstract: Antivirus software pioneer John McAfee is hospitalized briefly after being denied political asylum in Guatemala, as his lawyers make last-ditch effort to keep him from being flown back to Belize for questioning about the killing of a fellow American expatriate.
lead_paragraph: The antivirus software founder, wanted for questioning about a neighbor’s killing in Belize, said he had chest pains, but a doctor said he was suffering from stress.

headline.seo: John McAfee Is Hospitalized After Guatemala Denies Asylum
headline.main: McAfee Hospitalized Briefly After Denial of Asylum
headline.print_headline: McAfee Hospitalized Briefly After Denial of Asylum
